add.title: Pair your Roomba
add.press_home: Place your Roomba in its dock. Then, press the Home button until your Roomba starts making a series of sounds.

error.offline: Your Roomba went offline. Trying to reconnect...
error.in_use: Someone or something else is connected to your Roomba right now. Please disconnect from the Roomba and then try again.
error.spot_cleaning: Spot cleaning is only possible by pressing the button on your Roomba.
